analysis.key_quote: Schedule F will not improve performance, accountability and responsiveness in the civil service. In fact, it will do exactly the opposite. I strongly oppose the implementation of any part of this rule.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, highlighting concerns about politicization, accountability, and the potential negative impact on civil service performance. It emphasizes the importance of merit-based systems and due process protections, which align with opposition to the rule.
